mapper.select: select lr.id as id,alr.id as app_lend_request_id, lr.lend_customer_id as lend_customer_id , alr.state_type as state_type, lr.status as status from lend_app.app_lend_request alr left join finup_lend.lend_request lr on alr.id = lr.app_lend_request_id where alr.id in ( select alr.id from lend_app.app_lend_request alr, lend_app.app_customer ac where alr.app_customer_id = ac.id and mobile = #{mobile});
